0x141BC64C8D7C5529.name: _CLEAR_VEHICLE_TASKS
0x141BC64C8D7C5529.comment: Clears all active tasks assigned to the specified vehicle This cancels ongoing behaviors such as TASK_VEHICLE_DRIVE_TO_DESTINATION_2, or even tasks triggered by horses pulling the vehicle when they start moving due to gunfire etc. in the decompiles seems to always be paired with `0xEBA2081E0A5F4D17`
